meanings.sent1: The students carried satchelsful of books to school every day.
meanings.sent2: The store had a sale on satchelsful of different colors.
meanings.sent3: It was a funny sight to see a dog trying to carry a satchelsful of treats.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a satchelsful of memories, each one carefully stored.
meanings.sent5: The market was bustling with vendors selling satchelsful of goods.
